<Suicide By My Side
1:
--------------------
Text: Suicide by My Side:  It shows a substantial progress in their musical style; singer Kimberly Goss performs in a sharper, more aggressive vocal style, and guitarists Alexi Laiho and Roope Latvala perform more technical solos.

Triplets:<Kimberly Goss
2:
--------------------
Text: Suicide by My Side:  Goss has noted that while the title (and the title track lyrics) are to an extent autobiographical, unlike she states in the music video, she has never attempted suicide.
Triplets:<Suicide by My Side
